name: RealMC
description:
The upload comes with both a NSIS Installer and a Single Runtime Executable. I added both because Windows seems to dislike the executable...

This game was made for the Interstellar Game Jam 3 and as such is a bit rough, but functional. There are a lot of things that I wanted to add to this game, but I'm currently a team of a single person and can't spare many resources, so may stuff was cut from the final release.
However, that doesn't mean I'm not willing to add more things to it in the future.

This is the first project that I've ever "finished", relatively speaking. I decided to do this game jam to sharpen my problem-solving skills. And I feel like it did that, and also make me consume extreme amounts of coffee. All that matters is I did my best!
